quote: I'm very pleased with being a part of the Bean Pole family. It's a relationship that makes sense to me. I'm very pleased to have my name associated with Bean Pole Jeans.
author: Wentworth Miller

quote: It is easy for Christians to have the false impression that once we have established a relationship with Christ, which we believe sets us right with God, the problems of life will somehow scoot away or they will slowly be removed from our lives.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: I have a strange relationship with time. I'm not aware of it passing.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: Don't throw petals on the floor if they have no meaning. I would rather have a fun, casual relationship than have someone pretending they're completely in love with me.
author: Ashley Greene

quote: I had a great time making the last movie, 'Eclipse.' We shot my back-story stuff from the 1930's. But I was waiting for 'Breaking Dawn' because I love the relationship Rosalie has with Jacob and the rest of her family and Bella. She also provides comic relief.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I have a great relationship with my mother-in-law. We're both Leos, we understand each other.
author: Tori Amos

quote: In the grip of a neurological disorder, I am fast losing control of words even as my relationship with the world has been reduced to them.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Teenage readers also have a different relationship with the authors whose work they value than adult readers do. I loved Toni Morrison, but I don't have any desire to follow her on Twitter. I just want to read her books.
author: John Green

quote: I tour alone. There's no sound check, no back up. I stay with the hosts; I am in a family home and it's really nourishing. I just have to remember after the show not to run out into the living room in my pyjamas. Every day, it's a new relationship being built. It's odd and wonderful.
author: Jane Siberry

quote: The trouble with anyone when they're unhappy or in a relationship they recognize is not working but don't know what to do about is that they can't see farther out than that. If the relationship is not working, if what was there isn't there anymore, you have to do something about it.
author: Penelope Wilton

quote: I told my father to stop smoking around the age of two or three years old and he stopped smoking. So the relationship between the kid and the parent is very powerful, and if you give the kid the right information, it can be very useful to the family.
author: Doug E. Fresh

quote: It's actually meditative to sit in a character for an extended period of time, realizing what your relationship is to who you're playing and then letting go, just being there.
author: Frances Conroy

quote: The attack on ObamaCare was that Congress does not have the power under the Commerce Clause to force a private citizen into a private contractual relationship. If such a thing is permitted to stand, the anti-ObamaCare forces argue, there will be no limit to Congress's power in the future.
author: John Podhoretz

quote: In the past I would self destruct when it came to love - I was immature, throwing myself into things but now times have changed, I want a relationship where you understand the other person.
author: Elisabetta Canalis

quote: I like the idea of dating, but I'm not dating anyone exclusively, particularly right now. It's hard to be in a relationship unless you're ready to go public with it. So it's a lot easier for me to not be in a relationship. I really don't want that part of my life to be tabloid fodder.
author: Cory Monteith

quote: Just about every children's book in my local bookstore has an animal for its hero. But then, only a few feet away in the cookbook section, just about every cookbook includes recipes for cooking animals. Is there a more illuminating illustration of our paradoxical relationship with the nonhuman world?
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: I'm a proud strict mom and, you know, I'm really proud of the two daughters I've raised. And I'm especially proud of my relationship with them. We're very close. I think we're good friends.
author: Amy Chua

quote: Nature is a dream state at this point, that we almost don't have a real relationship to it unless it's people living off the land and killing our own food and going for it.
author: Catherine Opie

quote: When I got fired, I had a feeling of loss because Viacom had been a passionate long-term relationship. But I got my balance back. I guess it's like getting jilted by a girlfriend, a serious girlfriend. You move on.
author: Tom Freston

quote: At the very core of my relationship to learning is the idea that we should be as organic as possible. We need to cultivate a deeply refined introspective sense, and build our relationship to learning around our nuance of character.
author: Joshua Waitzkin

quote: We all fantasize about a relationship we'd like to do over or something we'd like to change about our past. I think there are a lot more opportunities for second chances in our lives than we think.
author: Jean Smart

quote: I am not married yet, but I think ultimately in a good marriage it is the relationship which is the most important thing. It is not a matter of who is right and who is wrong; it is a one plus one equals more than two.
author: Lawrence Bender

quote: I actually have very girly taste in television. I like a chicky relationship show probably more than anything. I really like 'Project Runway'.
author: David Nevins

quote: Therapy is not to 'talk about' things, but to change the person's life, and to relieve suffering, such as depression, anxiety, or relationship problems.
author: David D. Burns

quote: When I was climbing, I built up a close relationship with the Sherpa people.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: Cinema for me only has meaning when it has a relationship with what I see outside on the street.
author: Jacques Audiard

quote: In a serious relationship, I will definitely write music about a guy. I'm totally into mix tapes and I'm all about small little things. I'll drop by their door and just leave a gift or come over if they're sick and make them chicken noodle soup and rent a DVD and play board games. I think those little things mean a lot to someone.
author: Aly Michalka

quote: Arguably, the relationship between Liza Minnelli and Judy Garland is one of the great mother-daughter sagas of all time. Certainly, for certain people, and a lot of them, Liza is the bigger star. Liza is the more kind of viable legend, shall we say. Then there's the other camp, where Judy is the one.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Long-term relationships are an everyday choice. It's harder to be in a marriage than it is to bounce from one relationship to the next.
author: Pink

quote: The family is very important. They make me feel good always because if I won, when I started to be famous, the relationship never changed with my friends and family.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Surveys of thousands of gamers have shown that they're more likely to play real music if they play a music videogame. So it's an interesting relationship where the games aren't replacing something we do in real life, they're serving as a springboard to a goal we might have in real life, like learning to play an instrument.
author: Jane McGonigal

quote: Knowing so many people like myself who are singers and in traveling bands, the people you're in a relationship with feel slighted because they feel you're giving all your energy to your fans, and there's a lot of truth to that.
author: Kid Rock

quote: The relationship with my people, the Nigerian people, is very good. My relationship with the rulers has always been problematic.
author: Chinua Achebe

quote: I think that anyone who lives in New York, who's lived here, who's spent any time here, knows that it's basically a love-hate relationship, you might say. Even though I still think it's the greatest city in the world and I wouldn't live anywhere else, there're still things about it one doesn't like. The love far outweighs the negative.
author: Spike Lee

quote: When someone comes up to me and says, 'Mary, you helped save my marriage', or, 'Mary, you helped me get out of this abusive relationship', I'm in it, really in their lives. And I'm so passionate about my feelings, but also about showing people the way through theirs.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: Unfortunately, I think we've probably all had the experience that if we're in a relationship where one of the partners is doing it 'my' way, that relationship is not going to survive.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: I have no idea what my best material is. Different people like different things. I'll say this: The political stuff gets the press, but the relationship jokes sell all the seats.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I think that my regrets mostly have to do with my relationship with my ex-girlfriend. Every once in a while, you get those flashback memories of conversations you had with your exes, and you just, like, wince when you're walking down the street. Something occurs to you, 'Oh, no, I said that.'
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: The most difficult thing about my job is that I do a lot of 19-hour days. It's really difficult to have a life, never mind a relationship. I don't have any regrets, really. I'm quite content. I'm very stubborn and persistent. I just keep working.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: I kept on buying records and listening to them. Finally, I was able to hear the relationship between the jazz improvisers' solos and the underlying structure that it's based on, the chord progression. That was pretty easy to do in the swing era, y'know, when jazz was, like, pop music, you know. It had made the charts and everything like that.
author: Harvey Pekar

quote: 'Frozen' definitely isn't about a man, but about the relationship between two sisters. At different times in our lives we find ourselves either more connected to or disconnected from the people in our family, and I think audiences will really be able to relate to that.
author: Idina Menzel

quote: When you're in a relationship, if you just break it down to regular terms, people are attracted to something, and that's what they want you to be, and that's what you should just be, and for me, it's very simple - if I meet a girl and I say, 'This is what I like about you. Just continue. Every day.'
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: It's my strong belief that when people love each other and are desirous of creating a committed relationship with each other that they should be allowed to marry, regardless of their sexual orientation.
author: Wendy Davis

quote: Every single person in my life and every relationship I have is distant because all I do is music.
author: Mac Miller

quote: Food sovereignty is an affirmation of who we are as indigenous peoples and a way, one of the most surefooted ways, to restore our relationship with the world around us.
author: Winona LaDuke

quote: I think most polling shows that most Americans agree that when it comes to employment that, you know, people should be really judged by, you know, their competency and not, you know, who it is they choose to love or who they're in a relationship with.
author: Mark Takano

quote: The value of government to the people it serves is in direct relationship to the interest citizens themselves display in the affairs of state.
author: William Scranton

quote: It's grown into a personal relationship, yeah. I'm crazy about Jerry. I think he's a unique character.
author: Jon Voight

quote: Fame does lead to money, which I don't have a close relationship with. I'm the kind of guy who never sees the money - it all goes somewhere else. I don't understand it, I don't like to deal with it. I have a fear of not having it, because I grew up without it.
author: David Duchovny

quote: President Bush will come here and there will be new 'friends' of America to open a new relationship with the world, new economic fortunes for those who 'liberated' them.
author: Robert Fisk

quote: And one thing that I always believed and that I knew for certain was that I could never have sustained a personal relationship while I worked this hard, or while I was that driven this intensely by the story.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: It avoids a self-conscious relationship to the act. We live in the most self-conscious society in the history of mankind. There are good things in that, but there are also terrible things. The worst of it is, that we find it hard to give ourselves to the cultural process.
author: Larry Harvey

quote: 'Jackass: The Movie' is great. I think it's in the tradition of physical comedy, which I'm really interested in. Its relationship to gravity, and how gravity acts on the body.
author: Matthew Barney

quote: My relationship with 'Pollyanna' is a very personal one, because Pollyanna got me through my childhood.
author: Eleanor Porter

quote: The people at the record company had asked me if I could write a song about my life, my relationship with God, and where I'm from. Well, I can't write a song on purpose, my songs come in a moment of inspiration or desperation.
author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quote: In the book the relationship with Katharine and Almasy is sort of only in the patient's mind.
author: Michael Ondaatje

quote: The relationship between press and politician - protected by the Constitution and designed to be happily adversarial - becomes sour, raw and confrontational.
author: Roger Mudd

quote: I've been speaking at churches for years, as well as juvenile jails, rehabs and hospitals, and I always talk about my faith. That is a declaration of my relationship with God.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: I finally did work out a very good relationship with my father, but it was rough growing up. We had a lot of conflict, and I think it surfaced in many of my works.
author: Ira Levin

quote: At the time I perceived most religious men, particularly the pastors with all their talk about love, faith and relationship, as effeminate.
author: Luke Ford

quote: With all the weird surroundings of outer space the basic underlying theme of the show is a philosophical approach to man's relationship to woman. There are both sexes in the crew, in fact, the first officer is a woman.
author: Jeffrey Hunter

quote: It's not that, you know, when a relationship doesn't work and there are issues, you have to somehow work it out if there are children involved.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: I've never had a relationship with a record executive. I always went to the record company by someone that liked my playing. Then they would get fired, and I'd be left with the record company. And then - because they got fired - the record company wouldn't do anything for me.
author: Ornette Coleman

quote: There must of course be a relationship between translating and making poems of your own, but what it is I just don't know.
author: Robert Fitzgerald

quote: It's like our relationship is always about the other side that isn't the obvious side.
author: Rosario Dawson

quote: I think our strength is this strong relationship we have all together.
author: Guy Forget

quote: I mean, we're really making a quantum change in our relationship to the plant world with genetic modification.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: How do you build a relationship when you've hardly shared a word but suddenly share a child? How do you love a daughter you don't see for nearly two years? When does she become your daughter? How does she become your daughter?
author: Boris Becker

quote: This relationship is going to be built on trust.
author: Marla Maples

quote: What was a really private and nice relationship was judged and made to be something ugly.
author: Marla Maples

quote: Oh, the relationship with actors and managers and agents and things is a terrible problem sometimes.
author: John Schlesinger

quote: The film depends on the audience's belief in this relationship.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: I have this home in New York, I have a long-term relationship with my boyfriend, who's from Australia, and I had this business that I had maintain. Even though I wasn't actively shooting, there's a lot of peripheral work.
author: Claire Danes

quote: My parents had this relationship that was really terrifying. I mean, the level of hatred that they had, and the level of physical abuse - my mother would beat up my father, basically - and I think I was drawn to images on television that were bright and reflective.
author: Augusten Burroughs

quote: I've just finished my next collection, Possible Side Effects, and I'm now working on a collection of holiday stories as well as a memoir about my relationship with my father.
author: Augusten Burroughs

quote: So after the Lewinsky scandal, everything changed, and we moved from using the Bible to address the moral issues of our time, which were social, to moral issues of our time that were very personal. I have continued that relationship up until the present.
author: Tony Campolo

quote: My life isn't that dramatic. My dad really loves me, he just can't talk on the phone. He's too crippled and shy, and that's almost harder. He's there and he loves me, and I try and try and try, it's just impossible to have a relationship.
author: Joey Lauren Adams

quote: My relationship with my father is pretty non-existent.
author: Joey Lauren Adams

quote: Seven years ago, my father and I realized that our relationship was extremely unique, especially in the African-American community. He raised me to not only understand the fundamentals of basketball and to try to be a player with a high basketball IQ, but he wanted me to understand that my image and my name meant more than stats.
author: Allan Houston

quote: I had a non-existent knowledge of Queen Victoria's early years. Like everyone else, I thought of her as an old lady dressed in black. My mom had told me about her, though, that she had a very loving relationship with Albert, that they had lots of kids, and that he died young.
author: Emily Blunt

quote: Thank God I have four sons. The mother/daughter relationship is one of mankind's great mysteries, and for womankind, it can be hellaciously complicated. My mother and I are quintessential examples of the rewards and frustrations, and the joys and infuriations it can yield.
author: Melissa Gilbert

quote: I just want to have a great relationship with my child and have a great family dynamic.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: I've never really had a relationship with Hollywood. I've never had a desire to work there.
author: Audrey Tautou

quote: Having reached a point in which I was so bitter and exhausted from being a quote unquote public figure, I wanted to return to a more childlike relationship to writing.
author: David Leavitt

quote: I just want my relationship to be more for myself rather than a public statement.
author: Cynthia Nixon

quote: Oddly, I do have a problem with authority. I find it very difficult to knuckle down and follow rules. Which are the classic symptoms of someone who has a troubled relationship with their father. And yet, I never had a problem with my father.
author: Toby Young

quote: It is not really our country so much is the problem, it's sort of the parasitic relationship that Canada, and France, and other countries have towards us.
author: Bob Corker

quote: I wanted to deal with someone's idea of their relationship.
author: Charlie Kaufman

quote: It's such a thrilling part about being in a relationship at a young age, and all your feelings are apocalyptic, all your emotions are so huge.
author: Marc Webb

quote: I think people are by-and-large happy with the providers that they have got now. They treasure that doctor-patient relationship.
author: Bob McDonnell

quote: Ultimately, who you choose to be in a relationship with and what you do in your bedroom is your business.
author: Eminem

quote: This week, the world gathers in Beijing for the 2008 Olympic games. This is the extraordinary moment China has been dreaming of for 100 years. People have been longing for this moment, because it symbolises a turning point in China's relationship with the outside world.
author: Ai Weiwei

quote: Film's hard when you don't have any relationship with the director at all and you just show up. Then you really are just a gun for hire.
author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: When I play live, it's a conversation that we're all having with the song, and the audience... their response and relationship with the songs is as valid as my relationship with the songs.
author: Tori Amos

quote: My parents divorced when I was young but I was brought up in two really loving households. I didn't have a contentious relationship with my mom or dad.
author: Matt Damon

quote: Washington State has a strong tradition of a positive relationship - positive working relationship between labor and management, whether in the private sector or the public sector. It needs to continue to be that way.
author: Rob McKenna

quote: But I think there's something wonderful and extraordinary about climbing on your own and just that kind of relationship to the environment. I'm very addicted to the mountains. You know, so, I do like that solitude.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: You know, sex is actually not so original as the way people love or the stories behind each relationship, which is what you remember. Sex is sex in the end.
author: Jane Campion

quote: It's a luxury to be able to tell a long form story. I love novels, and I love to have a long relationship with characters.
author: Jane Campion

quote: My relationship with the Philharmonia Orchestra brought me many times to London and I will always reflect positively on that early period of development with them - their patience, their warmth, their dedication.
author: Gustavo Dudamel

quote: It seems I have a hard time being attracted to someone unless I respect what they do on some level. Otherwise, I would feel disdain for them. Which is not always pleasant in a relationship. Sometimes it's fun though.
author: Eric Stoltz

quote: I have a love/hate relationship with just about all technology in my life. My first typewriter in particular. I had a helluva time putting new ribbon on it.
author: Eric Stoltz

quote: Challenge is good for any relationship.
author: Darren Criss

quote: I think 'Tattoo's a song that can go so many different ways. Some people think of it as a break-up song, but, for me, it's about somebody who comes into your life and really touches you - be they a friend, a family member or someone you're in a relationship with.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: When it comes to 'Glee,' I feel like I've been in a relationship, and now I can mingle a bit.
author: Lea Michele

quote: Why should a great and powerful nation like the United States allow its relationship with more than a billion Muslims around the world to be defined by the narrow hatred and nihilistic actions of an exceptionally small minority of Muslims?
author: John O. Brennan

quote: Even though I'm not with their mother, it's important for my kids to see adults in a committed and happy relationship. They need to see a strong relationship. You don't have to settle.
author: Michael Strahan

quote: There are a few writers that one has a relationship with that means, basically, you do whatever they say. One is Caryl Churchill, and the other is David Hare.
author: Stephen Daldry

quote: I love changing. I hate it when people try to box me in to a relationship or in a work context. Any situation where I feel boxed in freaks me out. And I feel the need to reinvent myself or I'll get bored.
author: Stephen Daldry

quote: I've always gone out with much younger guys. But I rushed into relationships before really getting to know the person. What would come up as a warning sign within the first two weeks of dating would usually be the exact reason the relationship would end!
author: Carrie Ann Inaba

quote: One of the things I really love about TV is this symbiotic relationship you can get between the writers and the actors, and the characters start to come to life because you start to collaborate.
author: Carla Gugino

quote: Every relationship has its own language. It takes a long time to evolve and read one another. Just as it's true for people, it's also true on a national or cultural level.
author: David Mitchell

quote: I always want to have a personal relationship with everybody that works for me.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: You know, we're each the hero of our own story and we perceive what's going on around us, and especially in a relationship, from the kind of viewpoint of, 'Well, this is my story, and I'm the hero of that, and I justify what I do around it.'
author: Michael Sheen

quote: I took the fear of marriage from my parents' relationship, because I didn't want to end up in a relationship like that, whereas my brothers and sisters learnt a lesson from it and made sure they didn't carry it on into their own marriages.
author: John Mahoney

quote: When I sit down to write a novel, I am exploring my own relationship with God, with the struggle between good and evil, my own purpose.
author: Ted Dekker

quote: I love my life, my family and my friends, and I'm drawn to 'relationship' novels because of their affirming focus on the power of love to heal wounds and transform lives.
author: Susan Wiggs

quote: I don't like to think of my readership as 'fans,' a word which has always suggested a kind of power relationship I'm uncomfortable with.
author: Grant Morrison

quote: The relationship I have with my kids is beautiful.
author: William Levy

quote: I'm very interested in the language of photography in relationship to painting.
author: Catherine Opie

quote: I love what I do, but it is hard to have a personal relationship when you're never home.
author: Blake Mycoskie

quote: What can we learn from the battle between data and design? What can we learn from the relationship between Google and Apple? Clearly no one school of thought is right: Apple and Google are both wildly successful and profitable companies that changed the world.
author: Ben Parr

quote: I'm definitely one of those chicks who want to be in a relationship. I need somebody who can make me laugh and entertain me.
author: Aly Michalka

quote: It takes me forever to actually finish something like a ten-page essay. But, when I do, I usually love what they are. It's a complicated relationship.
author: Chris Abani

quote: Marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman. I don't think it is the role of the state to define what marriage is.
author: John Sentamu

quote: Early on I realized when you write a song about someone, it flatters them on some level, and gives you a lot of room to move within a relationship. A song can kind of get the girl, for sure.
author: Nick Cave

quote: I have a very strange relationship in general with women around my music. There's some that understand it and some that think there should be a law against it.
author: Nick Cave

quote: I have a really good relationship with a lot of designers. I like Gaultier, Billionaire and Cavalli.
author: Mickey Rourke

quote: Men tend to fall in love when they feel like they are cherished or revered as the 'man' in the relationship.
author: Sherry Argov

quote: In a relationship I'm a very loving person, emotional and sensitive.
author: Olivia Wilde

quote: I don't like to design single objects. I like my pieces to have a relationship to each other. They can be mother and child, like the Schmoo salt and pepper shakers, or brother and sister like the Birdie salt and peppers, or cousins, like most of my dinnerware sets.
author: Eva Zeisel

quote: People are fans of Dunkin' Donuts. They have a relationship with the company, they go there every day. Dunkin' Donuts is using Twitter to communicate with those people. There are people who are finding value in that. There's thousands of people, I don't know how many thousands now, following Dunkin' Donuts.
author: Evan Williams

quote: The fact that I am blind is not what defines my life. It should be of no more interest than my blood type. People wonder if there is a relationship between my lack of sight and the way I sing. But there's no connection.
author: Andrea Bocelli

quote: I hate the whole concept of comfort! It's like when people say: 'Well we're not really in love but we're in a comfortable relationship.' You're abandoning a lot of ideas when you're too into comfort.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: My relationship with shoes has always been linked to shoes, women, women in their shoes and performance.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: Adultery is the ultimate deal-breaker for me. I would rather be alone than in a relationship that doesn't honor me.
author: Garcelle Beauvais

quote: I was never the girl in high school who had a boyfriend for years. My longest relationship has been 18 months. I've thought maybe I'm really superficial and unable to have a relationship. What I've found is that people are attracted by my independence, and then they try to squelch it.
author: Pam Dawber

quote: There's something about that relationship between actor and audience. Whether you get it on Broadway or in a fine local playhouse, there's no greater drug. Every time I get to do TV, film and a play in the same year, it's my dream come true.
author: Roger Bart

quote: There is no more moving a professional relationship than that between a law clerk and a Supreme Court justice. As a place to work, the court is unique in its intimacy and intensity.
author: Cliff Sloan

quote: The one thing that about me, being a healer, I just have a different kind of relationship with people. So I am defiantly a different type of celebrity.
author: Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa

quote: My kid is a year and a half old, and I just want to roll around on the floor with him for a little bit and have a normal relationship with my family.
author: Sam Huntington

quote: I seem to be a long-term relationship kinda guy.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: People that spend time in a foxhole - they're never going to find that relationship anywhere else again... Everything else pales next to that. When you think about the Second World War vets - more than even the Vietnam vets - there's a brotherhood.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I think there is a big difference between the music business and music. And my relationship is to music, not music business. I think the business will keep changing, but music won't. Music will be there.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: If you ask me to describe my relationship, I mean - words are too clumsy to accurately describe how I feel in that regard, particularly in an interview. It's a strange thing.
author: Ryan Reynolds

quote: Anything that gets in the way of my focus to create gets cut out of my life. It's not easy. Sometimes it's family. Sometimes it's friends. Sometimes it's the ability to have a relationship.
author: John Zorn

quote: We must restore the emotional relationship that people have to the idea of America, that no matter where you come from, no matter where you live, that you have access to the same opportunities that somebody who is born in privilege.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: I like all of the early relationship strips that were collected in 'Love Is Hell,' where I pretended to be an expert in relationships and did comics like 'The Nine Types of Boyfriends,' 'Sixteen Ways to End a Relationship,' 'Twenty-Four Things Not to Say in Bed,' and other arbitrarily numbered lists.
author: Matt Groening

quote: My working and personal relationship with President Obama is marked by growing trust. I appreciate this.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: You don't want to be ungenerous toward people who give you prizes, but it is never the social or political message that interests me in a novel. I begin with an interest in a relationship, a situation, a character.
author: John Irving

quote: I have a great relationship with my kids. We're very honest with each other, and I'm very proud that we are absolutely, incredibly close. That to me is more important than anything.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: It is almost always a fault of one who loves not to realize when he ceases to be loved.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to have to do forty pounds of laundry a week.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: You have people come into your life shockingly and surprisingly. You have losses that you never thought you'd experience. You have rejection and you have learn how to deal with that and how to get up the next day and go on with it.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Before machines the only form of entertainment people really had was relationships.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: My view is that marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman. That's the position I've had for some time, and I don't intend to make any adjustments at this point... Or ever, by the way.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: It destroys one's nerves to be amiable every day to the same human being.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I was in a relationship with a girl I loved for three years. Where do you go after three years? Then you've got to start thinking about other things, and I'm too young to think about those things.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: A relationship isn't going to make me survive. It's the cherry on top.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: When I got my first television set, I stopped caring so much about having close relationships.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: The man as he converses is the lover; silent, he is the husband.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Every relationship I've been in, I've overwhelmed the girl. They just can't handle all the love.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: I have stepped off the relationship scene to come to terms with myself. I have spent most of my adult life being 'someone's girlfriend', and now I am happy being single.
author: Penelope Cruz

quote: Well, a girlfriend once told me never to fight with anybody you don't love.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: I'm 31 now. I think I'm beginning to understand what life is, what romance is, and what a relationship means.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I'm done with men... I'm going to be alone. I have no luck with relationships. I don't think I'm made for marriage.
author: Halle Berry
